bibl.title: New Research on Medieval Embroideries from Tell Edfu at the Louvre Museum.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: History of discovery. - The Louvre collection and recent work. - Embroideries from the Medieval cemetery: Three embroideries with geometrical designs (counted-threads embroideries); - A headband; - A woman's handkerchief?; - A tiraz fragment. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Amandine Mérat, New Research on Medieval Embroideries from Tell Edfu at the Louvre Museum.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 21 (2014) pp. 63-79, 1 tabl., 6 pll. coul.

History of discovery. - The Louvre collection and recent work. - Embroideries from the Medieval cemetery: Three embroideries with geometrical designs (counted-threads embroideries); - A headband; - A woman's handkerchief?; - A tiraz fragment. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
